MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 09-NOV-2020 17:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the EH12 area of Edinburgh. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:46pm. Our engineers have arrived onsite at the South Gyle Park substation to investigate the fault and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:31pm on Monday, 09 November 2020
